title: Oceanic Pro League Round 2 tipping! Who are you backing?
body:
Hey everyone! 

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/opl_split_1_announce.jpg?itok=aX-Y1qp7

Round two of the [Oceanic Pro League](http://oce.lolesports.com/schedule) is fast approaching!
I want to see who you think will win, check out the links below and put in your vote!
The tipping form will close at 5:30 pm AEDT on the 12th of February.

[Click here](https://docs.google.com/a/riotgames.com/forms/d/1FjhNh2yHPR978WvLdQPbtXUDDubxFmRNJzeT-CEejTU/viewform) to go to the tipping form

Anyone that can pick **ALL** 8 games correct will get a **10 win IP Boost!**

**Thursday Feb 12th Games**

6pm AEDT Legacy vs Sudden Fear
7pm approx. Avant Garde vs Legacy
8pm approx. Sudden Fear Team Immunity
9pm approx. Team Immunity vs Avant Garde


**Monday Feb 16th Games**

6pm AEDT	Chiefs vs 4Not
7pm approx.	Dire Wolves vs Chiefs
8pm approx.	4Not vs Rich Gang
9pm approx.	Rich Gang vs Dire Wolves

You can catch all the action at our [twitch channel](http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania)

Comment below with what you picked and why!

replies.body: Really pumped for the games this week lets bring it 4-0!! BOL to all teams :D
Wolves would be great to pull it through, but i don't see it happening.
Dire wolves all the way I've been watching  them for ages, although  out of all the lcs teams my favourite is either samsung white or TSM
